content.detailedDescription: My friend,my nephew and i were going to sleep on the deck one night because itwas really clear. we were looking at the stars for a while and i saw somethingcoming from the sw and it went over us pretty high in the air. it seemed like anegg that was shiny like stainless steel. it came back over us going east andonce again going ne. it made no sound you could see it wasnt an airplane,it wasvery easy to makeout the shape against the black sky. this happend in about 3-4min. there was no way to tell exactly how fast the egg was traveling but itseemed alot faster than planes. it would completely disappear, not over thehorizon but in the sky.In afew seconds it would reappear heading in a newdirection
content.summary: Shiny egg-shaped ufo in tennesee

content.detailedDescription: Couple of nights ago saw a flash as i was driving home and looked to where itcame from and there where blinking kindof lights. got the cam corder and gotsome footage.  then tonight saw that same kind of flash.  looked to where itcame from and the same thing was there only closer.  it is just above the eastmountain area. i feel scared a little to go and take more footage because thereseems to be more than one in the sky.  but i feel a need to know, so as soon asmy camere has more juice i will get more footage.  im very serious about mysighting.  this has never happened before nor have i ever really been abeliever.  this is almost changing my mind
content.summary: Green and red mainly. flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: I was walking back from my 4:15 class.  i was looking in the skies as i oftendo.  nearing my dorm, i noticed an object in the air which i couldnt readilyidentify as a plane or any craft i knew of.  it appeared as a metallic graycylander with spherical attachments on the ends.  the one on the right side waseither lit up or was reflecting the sun which was beginning to set in the west,behind me.  i removed my sunglasses to see it with the naked eye and there wasno difference.  as i stood there studying it for any evidence that it was aplane, it seemed to vanish before my eyes.  i couldnt figure out whether itturned a particular way or whether it just disappeared.  i stayed outside for afew more minutes to look for any trace of it in the clear sky but there wasnone.  no contrails, no other craft or sign on it again.
content.summary: An object hung in the sky and then vanished at hig

content.detailedDescription: I would like to know if what i saw eleven years ago was a ufo or a naturaloccuring phenomenon.  i was stationed in germany in 1990.  one night whileguarding an ammo holding area in an isolated area, i saw a bright red light thatwas as bright as the sun.  i was sitting in a small wooden guard shack thatresembled an outhouse but with windows.  the window to my left was boarded upwith plywood3b i could not see the source of the light because of the board.  it was two orso in the morning and it was quiet with no activity.  the area where the ammowas stored at had no lights.  the only source of light i had was a flashlight. the ammo holding area was located in a tactical training area3b the use of white light outdoors was prohibited.  it was quiet and i cantrecall if the skies were clear or not.  there was no moon and it was dark. suddenly the whole area in front of me lit up like it was noon.  it was as ifsome one had turned on a light in a room.  i could clearly see everything aroundme.  it was just like daylight but the light was red.  there was no sound and itonly lasted a second.  the source seemed to come from the sky and to my left3b i could not see the source because of the plywood.  i dont know what couldcreate a light with the same intensity as the sun and not make a noise.  aminute of two later a pair of military humvee sped pass by on a road that wasnear my guard shack.  the vehicles had flashing lights on top.  nothing happenedafter that.  the next morning i asked around.  no one knew anything about itwhile others did not say anything.  i would like to know if what it was that isaw that night3b whether it was a ufo or not.  i was 21 at the time of the incident.
content.summary: Unkown source of redlight with a brightness equal

content.detailedDescription: It is a cold, clear night.  julie and i walked outside after the news at 10 oclock.   to the west, a jet was flying eastward over us.  while watching thelights blinking on the aircraft, we witnessed a larger craft, flying at a higheraltitude coming from the north.  as close as we could ascertain, the highercraft was triangular, much larger, faster, and completely noiseless.   thetriangle craft went out of our horizon while the jet was still in our view.  thetriangle craft had a white light on the nose as we first viewed it, but as itwent south, all three lights at the corners were orange-red.  none of the lightsflashed at all.  the triangle was in view for only 30 seconds to a minute. strangeness is afoot in the skies over arkansas.
content.summary: Triangle craft flying south over arkansas

content.detailedDescription: While driving north on us 23 from his home in fenton to his job in flint mi. the witness is a deputy sheriff for genesee county.  he has been on the forcefor over 19 years. while driving he noticed 2 lights over the road.  at first hethought it was a plane. he kept driving for about a mile or so, and he noticedthat whatever it was, it was not moving. he watched it and it still didnt move. he drove under it and passed it.  at this time he was about 5 miles south ofbishop airport.  he looked in his rear view mirror and saw what looked likewindows at the back of it.  it still was in the same place over the road.  hekept driving on his way to work, and lost sight of it. he says he wished hestopped to get a better look at what ever it was.
content.summary: Deputy sheriff sees  anomalous lights near freeway

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were in park city, utah in january during the sundance filmfestival. one night at dusk i saw what appeared to be a huge orange star comingup over the western mountains. i said look at that huge star to my brother. hethought it must be a planet, but we are both amateur sky gazers and decided thatit wasnt a planet after all. venus and mars are only up during the day in thewinter and jupiter and saturn move from the upper sky to the western sky overthe course of the evening. the star object we saw came up from the westernhorizon and hovered for an hour just above the mountains. i thought it lookedorange but my brother thought it was blue26 white. as we looked closer, it appeared to change colors at random intervalsfrom orange to blue to white then back to orange. it also appeared to get biggerand brighter, then smaller and dimmer as we looked at it. driving home from parkcity to salt lake city, we lost sight of it behind the walls of the canyon.However, this same star keeps appearing every few nights, sometimes onconsecutive nights, at different times between dusk and 9:00 pm mst. it alwaysrises suddenly just over the western mountains3b it always hovers26 changes colors for an hour or so3b sometimes it moves steadily south along the ridge of the mountains3b my brother and i have observed it many times while airplanes fly just underit toward the airport3b it is definitely too big26 bright to be a star or planet3b since the middle of january it has appeared every other night or so and everysunday night. however, neither of us has seen it for a couple of weeks, exceptlast sunday and we will be checking for it again tonight.
content.summary: Hovering orange star appearing over salt lake city

content.detailedDescription: Was nightfall-wife and i were visiting our daughter and grandson in san marcostexas-on earle street--i said to my grandson -lets go out side i wish tosmoke-when we got out side i instantly saw several ufos (7 to 10) flying veryhigh sort of playing around-then came the triangle shaped one so low it actuallyblocked out the stars for some seconds-beautiful lights and absolutly nonoisevery scarry-i called for my wise and daughter--they laughed and would notcomeout-i called the other family in the duplex-they came out-2 adults and 2small children-it was breathtaking-thank you --rfm--
content.summary: Several large ufo sighting

content.detailedDescription: At around 330 am saw strange coulored lights in sky on horizen changed color andflashed same color light at each other. traveled very fast and traveled in atriangle.  they would shoot towards each other then stop.  would change colorand i flashed a light at them, they stopped.  anytime a car would come by theywould fade out then after car passed would come back.  woke up today feelingvery worn out, disoriented.
content.summary: 3 then 5 globes of lights, not aircraft move to fa

content.detailedDescription: (you can type over theseinstructions.)please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typedpage). 1) i was driving my car east on hiway 8/80 through the mohawk mountains.2@3) first observed object entering view at extreme angle (6-8d) as if it was alarge meteor/fireball. very bright,as if it was burning. 4) i took my foot offof the gas, so to slow down a bit3b to observe better, i placed my face into the windshield. a protrusion in therock to my right hid the object for a moment, and i scanned the area opposite tocatch sight as it re-entered my view. when i realized what it was i wasobserving, i was at first scared then elated as a long held belief wasconfirmed. 5) object was an interstellar space craft. i have only seen drawingsin caves that come anywhere close to this design. surface was as if liquidmercury. glowing, too. brilliant as the sun, but did not hurt your eyes to lookdirectly into it. my first impression was that it was having some smallmechanical problem3b it was twisting from side to side while keeping steady speed. seemed to flushsomething that trickled off orange, then material stopped glowing after leavinginfluence of surrounding aura. i got a wonderful full 3d view of this ship, andwas able to make a detailed model/drawings of it. very simple design, veryfunctional. no lights, no windows, nothing protruding off of the ship. only itemevident was a 3/4 exposed ball (dome) on top, which i have come to believe wasthe main drive. 6)ship regained control, leveled out and ran the length of themountain range until out of sight. through the entire sighting, this ship, whichwas the size of an airliner, made no sound3b not even an echo off of the surrounding canyon.I had no radio on in car, nointerior running lighting. all windows were open, and most of the observationwas hanging out of the drivers window. only other vehicle in the area was anolder model ford stationwagon, which left the scene like a bat out of hell. itried to chase it down, to compair notes, but gave up after reaching 106 mph.Additional details are available.
content.summary: Real-time sighting of space craft.....Not ufo

content.detailedDescription: A family was trick or treating and noticed a white to greenish white brightelliptical  object flying at low altitude from east to west.  they were facingnorth and they watched this object for approx. 7-10 secs. the object was seen tobreak apart or eject a second object, along with some sparks during thisejection or breaking apart.  the second object was seen to hover for approx. 2secs. and then simply disappear.  the first object continued on its originalpath and disappeared beyond a tree line out of the witnesses sight.
content.summary: Family in onsted, michigan sees object on hallowee
